import React from 'react' const Contact = () => { const contact_info=[ {logo: "mail", text: "coogfkdc"}, {logo: "logo-whatsapp", text: "coogjgdc"}, {logo: "location", text: "cochfghjfghjodc"} ] return (

Contact Me

{ contact_info.map((contact,i)=>(
{contact.text}
)) }
) } export default Contact
